issue.title: [Python/C++] Support for zero-sized device buffers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3624](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3624). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
CUDA cuMemAlloc raises an error when trying to allocate device memory with zero-size.
On the other, using zero sized buffers or arrays is important for generic programming.
